title: Jim McMahon – 2021 Comments on Rail Cuts
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jim McMahon, the Shadow Transport Secretary, on 5 January 2021.
content:
The Government must ensure that transport services are being run in such a way that the essential workers using them, as well as staff, are kept safe.
